data.title: Asia Market Open: Bitcoin Tops $90k As Rate Cut Bets And Tech Strength Boost Risk Appetite
data.description: Good morning, Asia. Here’s what’s moving before the bell.Bitcoin climbed back above $90,000 on Thursday as Asian markets opened in a broadly positive mood, with stocks firmer and the dollar softer on growing expectations that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates in December.Trading volumes stayed light in a holiday-shortened ...
data.keywords: Asian markets, Risk Appetite, Bitcoin, Asia, Federal Reserve
